word: Another element of prevailing prayer is faith. \93He that cometh to God must believe that He is, and that He is a rewarder of them that diligently seek Him.\94 Hebrews 11:6. Jesus said to His disciples, \93What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.\94 Mark 11:24. Do we take Him at His word?
